Sentence.value: Acute myeloid leukemia (AML) is cancer that starts inside bone marrow.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: [[Acute myeloid leukemia|C0023467]] (AML) is [[cancer|C0006826]] that starts inside bone marrow.

Sentence.value: The cancer grows from cells that would normally turn into white blood cells.
Sentence.pattern_crowdsource: The [[cancer|C0006826]] grows from [[cells|C0007634]] that would normally turn into white blood cells.
